title: The role of secondary metabolites in the production of CuO nanoparticles by fungi: A physiological and metabolic approach

Previous studies showed that the biosynthesis of nanoparticles by diverse fungi is linked to the secretion of NADPH/NADH in the growth media. The results of these studies suggested that the...
